modName: Osare Panty CBBE TBBP with Bodyslide
summary: Osare Panty for CBBE with TBBP
descriptionHtml:
This is the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26305/?]Osare Panty - UNP[/url], now for CBBE, using CBBE++ BodySlide 2 with TBBP This is [color=yellow][b]NOT[/b][/color] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14294/]Osare Underwear[/url]. They're completely separate mods.

The original panty this is a conversion from is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3496215]anano[/url], and using Outfit Studio, converted it to CBBE with TBBP weights.

I've also included the Slider files needed to modify the body yourself with Bodyslide, and create your own body. PLEASE READ THE BODY SLIDE INFO below on important details to avoid issues, and what presets I used, and should do to tweak yours.

[size=4][color=red][b]###MUST DOWNLOAD TO SHOW IN GAME###[/b][/color][/size]
This is a conversion of the following mod, and is [b][color=red][u]REQUIRED[/u][/color][/b].
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26305/?]Osare Panty for UNP[/url]

[size=3][color=red][b][u]Required :[/u][/b][/color][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE Body[/url]

[u]Files for TBBP[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34713/?]TBBP animation by Dragonfly[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Skeleton (or other TBBP compatible skeleton)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?]FNIS[/url] (only to install TBBP. Follow instructions from dragonfly TBBP)


[size=3][color=yellow][b]## UPDATE ##[/b][/color][/size]
v 1 - Mod Released


[size=3][b][u]Installing :[/u][/b][/size]

1) Download original mod - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26305/?]Osare Panty - UNP[/url]

2) Download this and overwrite


[size=3][b][u][color=yellow]Clipping Issues (like with Feminine Running and dash animations/XP32 animation pack)[/color][/u][/b][/size]
It should not be clipping for walking and running. Is the butt bouncing when nude? I recommend downloading and installing bodyslide 2 with outfit studio. From there, choose CalienteBodyAdvancedTBBP in the slider set at the top left, then under presets, click my CB++ TBBP under preset. You then click create bodies. If you get an issue where your boobs seem flat/squished, use the CB++ TBBP-fix preset to create bodies. You may also feel free to play with the sliders if you wish to create a more unique body. Just be sure to create bodies with both the CalienteBodyAdvancedTBBP and the OsarePanty so there's no clipping issue.


[size=3][b][u]BodySlide Info : [/u][/b][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Download Bodyslide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url]

Use this to modify the body with the sliders included to your heart's content. You will find it under sliderset OsarePantyCBBE-TBBP.





Credits for original mesh to aneno
Credits for CBBE body to Caliente
Credits for Fair Skin Complexion to HHaleyy
Credits for ENB used in screenshots to SkyrimTuner, using RealVision ENB - Option B

Special thank you as well Ousnius for helping me on the forums in your OS Tutorial: "Anything to Anything" conversion thread.
author: Sylis
